comment: Polarization identity. Recovers inner product from norm. Exercise 4(a) of [ReedSimon] p. 63. The outermost operation is + instead of - due to our mathematicians' (rather than physicists') version of axiom ~ ax-his3 . (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
